title: RBI Grade B - ESI - FLM3 - Descriptive

quiz.text:
Ques.1) “Empowering women is the key to control population growth.” Discuss
[Marks: 10, Word Limit: 400, Difficulty Level: Moderate]

Ques.1) The public expenditure management is a challenge to the Government of India in context of budget making during the post liberalization period. Clarify it.
[Marks: 15, Word Limit: 600, Difficulty Level: Difficult]

Ques.2) Do we have cultural pockets of small India all over the nation? Elaborate with examples.
[Marks: 10, Word Limit: 400, Difficulty Level: Difficult]

Ques.2) What are the salient features of ‘inclusive growth’? Has India been experiencing such a growth process? Analyze and suggest measures for inclusive growth.
[Marks: 15, Word Limit: 600, Difficulty Level: Moderate]

Ques.3) Is inclusive growth possible under market economy? State the significance of financial inclusion in achieving economic growth in India.
[Marks: 10, Word Limit: 400, Difficulty Level: Moderate]

Ques.3) Customs and traditions suppress reason leading to obscurantism. Do you agree?
[Marks: 15, Word Limit: 600, Difficulty Level: Difficult]
